title: DevFest Rift Valley '17
description: Each DevFest is inspired by and uniquely tailored to the needs of the developer community that hosts it. While no two events will be exactly alike, each event will, at its core, be powered by a shared belief that when developers come together to exchange ideas, amazing things can happen. Ours is no Exception!
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev
subscribeNote: No spam, only the latest news and updates!
ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, Tea breaks, lunch and party. Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.
socialMotto: Add to circles, like, follow or connect with us here
locationDescription: The School of Information Sciences, Moi University
aboutOrganizers: GDG Moi with support of GDG Kabarak and GDG Egerton from the Rift Valley region (North Rift) is proud organizer of DevFest Rift Valley '17
aboutGdg: Google Developer Groups (GDGs) are for developers who are interested in Google's developer technology; everything from the Android, Chrome, Drive, and Google Cloud platforms, to product APIs like the Cast API, Maps API, and YouTube API.
teamPageText: <a href='https://developers.google.com/groups/' target='_blank'>Google Developer Groups<a> offer unique activities targeted to developers, such as hackathons and codelabs.As GDG Moi University our Mission is to connect talented developers giving them the chance to exchange ideas, teach their skills and acquire new ones.
